to.sven.androidrccar.common.test.logic

Class AbstracLogicTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • AndroidTestCase
      • to.sven.androidrccar.common.test.logic.AbstracLogicTest

  • public class AbstracLogicTest
extends AndroidTestCase
    This class should test the behavior of the AbstractLogic. Notes: initialized() is implicit tested by any of this tests.
    Author:
    sven
